LanguageData.OE_Torraxin.label: torraxin
LanguageData.OE_Torraxin.description: A specialized combat stimpack with 3 stages of effect (the effect weakens over time), intended for use by melee fighters. Obsidia technology, a stimpack can be addictive and has unpleasant after-effects.
LanguageData.OE_Joltixin.label: joltixin
LanguageData.OE_Joltixin.description: A specialized combat stimpack with 3 stages of effect (the effect weakens over time), intended for use by gunners. Obsidia technology, a stimpack can be addictive and has unpleasant after-effects.
LanguageData.OE_Luraxin.label: luraxin
LanguageData.OE_Luraxin.description: A specialized combat stimpack with 3 stages of effect (the effect weakens over time), intended for use by psy-users. Obsidia technology, a stimpack can be addictive and has unpleasant after-effects.
LanguageData.OE_Alcrexin.label: alcrexin
LanguageData.OE_Alcrexin.description: A specialized combat stimpack with 3 stages of effect (the effect weakens over time), intended for use by mechanitors. Obsidia technology, a stimpack can be addictive and has unpleasant after-effects.
